build_steps: cd lang/c++/build; env LD_LIBRARY_PATH='/TEMPLATE_BOOST_ROOT/lib' make -jTEMPLATE_JOBS; make install
cd lang/c++/build; env LD_LIBRARY_PATH='TEMPLATE_CLANG_CPP_LIBRARIES:/TEMPLATE_CLANG_RUNTIME_RPATH:/TEMPLATE_BOOST_LIBCXX_ROOT/lib' make -jTEMPLATE_JOBS; make install

./b2 install toolset=clang --without-mpi threading=multi link=shared cxxstd=20 cxxflags='-fPIC -DBOOST_SYSTEM_NO_DEPRECATED -Dconsteval=constexpr' linkflags='-Wl,-rpath,/TEMPLATE_BOOST_RPATH' -jTEMPLATE_JOBS

./b2 install toolset=clang --without-mpi threading=multi link=shared cxxstd=20 --disable-icu boost.locale.icu=off cxxflags='-fPIC -DBOOST_SYSTEM_NO_DEPRECATED -Dconsteval=constexpr -stdlib=libc++ -nostdinc++ -ITEMPLATE_CLANG_CPP_HEADERS' linkflags='-stdlib=libc++ -Wl,-rpath,/TEMPLATE_CLANG_RUNTIME_RPATH:/TEMPLATE_BOOST_LIBCXX_RPATH' -jTEMPLATE_JOBS
cd TEMPLATE_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib; ln -sf libc++.so.1.0 libc++.so.1 && ln -sf libc++.so.1 libc++.so
cd TEMPLATE_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib; ln -sf libc++abi.so.1.0 libc++abi.so.1 && ln -sf libc++abi.so.1 libc++abi.so
cd build; env LD_LIBRARY_PATH=TEMPLATE_BOOST_ROOT/lib make -jTEMPLATE_JOBS; make install
